External Deployment. The term "External Deployment" means the use or distribution of
             the Original Work or Derivative Works in any way such that the Original Work or Derivative

Jurisdiction, Venue and Governing Law. Any action or suit relating to this License may be brought

Attorneys Fees. In any action to enforce the terms of this License or seeking damages relating

Miscellaneous. This License represents the complete agreement concerning the subject matter

Definition of "You" in This License. "You" throughout this License, whether

Right to Use. You may use the Original Work in all ways not otherwise restricted or conditioned
